business_details.Business: Case record is received on transfer for trial from Honourable Special Judge, Dhubri.Perused the case record. It reveals that accused Bappi Sk was released on bail on 12.09.19. Issue summon to accused Bappi Sk.

Accused Bappi Sk is appeared and filed a petition No. 1218/19 praying for allowing him to go on previous bail.Also seen the petition No. 1219/19 filed by Sujab Ali Sk, bailor of the accused has consented to remain as bailor of the accused.Heard. Prayers are allowed till the verification report of land document is received.Copy is furnished to the accused person.

Accused person is present. heard both sides. I have perused the FIR, the statement of the victim and also the statement of other witnesses. There are sufficient materials to frame charges under sec 366(A) nd sec 12 of POCSO Act. Accordingly, charges under section 366(A) and 12 of POCSO Act are framed against the accused person. The charges are read over and explained to the accused person to which he pleaded not guilty and claimed trial. Issue summons to the witnesses.
Accused Bappi Sk is present.Four witnesses (PW-1, PW-2, PW-3 and PW-4) are present. They are examined, cross examined and discharged.Issue summons to other witnesses.

Accused person is present.Three witnesses (PW-5, PW-6 and PW-7) are present. They are examined, cross examined and discharged.Issue summon to the Principal of Bethel Baptist Mission School, Dhubri and M.O.

As per notification No. 18, dtd 24.03.2020 of the Honble Gauhati High Court, Guwahati and order No. 29, dated 19.03.2020 regarding prevention from Covid-19, the P.O. is not on duty today. Accused as well as witnesses are absent due to Lock down. Issue summon to witnesses.
